title: Resume Michał Lechowicz
about-point-1: I am a graduate of the Faculty of Computer Science and Telecommunications at Cracow University of Technology.
about-point-2: I have been fascinated by computer science since an early age.
about-point-3: Additionally, I strive to stay updated with the latest trends by reading blogs, attending webinars, and listening to programming podcasts.
about-point-4: I have been creating in Java / Spring Boot and Angular.
about-point-5: During my internship, I assisted in preparing migration instructions for a new environment. I also worked on improving CI/CD and a script used for creating Docker images.
about-point-6: I implemented CI/CD using GitHub Actions and versioning for databases in my projects.
about-point-7: I would like to apply my skills in real-world applications.
ftm-description: Web application to track income and spendings for user's financial analysis. This application has been used for my thesis.
ftm-technologies: Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot 3, Spring Security – Web Token, Liquibase, TestContainers, Hibernate, PostgreSQL, Angular 16, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker, JUnit, CI/CD - GitHub Action, REST
q&a-description: Web application for prepare to interview.
q&a-technologies: Technologies: Java 17, Spring Boot 3.1, Gradle, Spring Security – Web Token, Spring HATEOAS, MongoDB, Angular 17, REST, Git, CI/CD - GitHub Action
codecool-ft-curriculum: CURRICULUM: Java, SQL, design pattern (ex. MVC, DAO, Builder), JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Java EE, Spring, Spring Boot
codecool-basic-curriculum: CURRICULUM: Basics of Python, Clean code, Git, unit tests, SCRUM
hobby-content: I like playing board games, chess, and adventure video games. Apart from that, I read blogs about new technologies. In addition, I am a hobbyist of political science, history and psychology. In my free time, I build DIY projects based on Arduino.
